Teachers

Check out our amazing teachers...

Stuard Smith

Stuart is an excellent web designer. He has 4+ years experience in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Rest assured, you are in safe hands with Stuart.

Caroline Mayers

Caroline has 6 years experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science. She will make sure that you learn the most up-to-date technologies and give you a way into the world of artificial intelligence.

Teresa Sanders

Teresa is our games design specialist. She has excellent knowledge of C++ & Unreal Engine 4, and C# & the Unity Engine. She will introduce you to games design by delving into the basics using a library called PyGame.

Andrew Senna

Stuart is our second web designer, but just as great as Stuard. He has 3 years experience in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. He will give you a great experience in web design.

Michael Forbes

Michael has 4 years experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science. He will make sure that you learn the most up-to-date technologies and give you a way into the world of artificial intelligence.

Sasha Hamilton

Sasha is our second games design specialist. She has excellent knowledge of C++ & Unreal Engine 4, and C# & the Unity Engine. She will introduce you to games design by delving into the basics using a library called PyGame.

Our excellent teachers always do their best when teaching. Join us and advance your computing career! You won't regret it!
